weekly_top_story.headline: HHS Unveils Comprehensive AI Strategy to Integrate Artificial Intelligence Across Healthcare and Department Operations
weekly_top_story.summary: The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services released a strategic plan to incorporate AI technologies into healthcare workflows, internal operations, and research to enhance patient outcomes and operational efficiency, marking a significant step toward digital transformation in health services.

stories.headline: House Passes Hospital Inpatient Services Modernization Act Extending Medicare Acute Hospital Care at Home Waiver
stories.summary: The House approved legislation to extend the Medicare Acute Hospital Care at Home waiver program for five years, supporting continued telehealth-enabled hospital care for eligible patients and potentially reshaping inpatient care delivery.

stories.headline: CDC to Hold Webinar on 2025-2026 Seasonal Influenza Vaccination Recommendations
stories.summary: The CDC will conduct a clinician webinar discussing updated influenza vaccine guidance and clinical recommendations for the 2025-2026 season, critical for planning immunization strategies and patient care.
stories.source: Safety Net Alliance Federal Health Policy Update
